attributes.action: Vote for the implementation of the referendum on Brexit.
attributes.additional_details:
406 constituencies voted to leave
242 constituencies voted to remain
A clear instruction, not request,an instruction on how to vote.
what gives these politicians the belief that they know better and totally disregarded the instruction of 17.4 million people
attributes.background: This is to prove that this country still values living in a democracy and not in a governmental dictatorship where politicians can disregard the will of their constituents by imposing their own requirements on how to vote following a referendum that instructed them how to vote.
